metadata.synopsis: The party comes across a trio of goblins who've captured a gnome and have turned to tormenting him - they've tied him to a windmill and are watching him spin around. The party can try to intervene and save the gnome, possibly using a cult symbol of authority as a way to convince the goblins, if they have it. FOR_GnomeGoblin_1 (Fezzerk) is the leader of the goblins and does most of the talking. If the player is a drow, the goblins will be much more nervous and easier to intimidate. At times, the captive goblin pipes up from the windmill, loudly pleading or berating his captors.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD-Main_A3. goto 27.47, 34.27, 419.294. Advance towards the windmill5. Cinematic should trigger automaticaly

2.speaker: Fezzerk
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The lead goblin's face falls mid-sentence when he realises he's being confronted by a drow.NodeContext: The goblin loses his bluster mid sentence upon realising he's facing a feared drow

26.speaker: Barcus Wroot
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: A captive deep gnome swings past on the sail of a spinning windmill. Though he's in peril, this is basically being played as a comedic beat.NodeContext: Distressed. The deep gnome is tied to the sail of a windmill and desperately calls for help as he rotates. He's a short-moderate distance away and has to shout to be heard.

18.speaker: Barcus Wroot
18.context:
CinematicNodeContext: A captive deep gnome wriggles on the sail of a (stationary) windmill. Though he's in peril, this is basically being played as a comedic beat.
NodeContext: Distressed. The deep gnome is tied to the sail of a windmill and desperately calls for help. He's a short-moderate distance away and has to shout to be heard.

89.speaker: Narrator
89.text: *The goblin seems unsure whether to bow to you or attack.*

71.speaker: Fezzerk
71.text: W-what do you want, or, I mean... what do you need?
71.context: NodeContext: Nervous, fumbling over his words. He's naturally afraid of drows such as the player.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: An explanation - tell me what you're doing with that deep gnome, at once.
84.context: NodeContext: Fezzerk trails off, realising that he might be revealing too much to the player.

268.speaker: Fezzerk
268.context: NodeContext: Fezzerk trails off, realising that he might be revealing too much to the player.

53.speaker: Fezzerk
53.text: You... you are blessed, ain't ya? A True Soul?
53.context: NodeContext: Warily seeking confirmation that the player is a superior of his, and not some random stranger.

39.speaker: Narrator
39.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*
39.context: CinematicNodeContext: The lead goblin's nervous expression slips away as he realises he was mistaken about the player's allegiance. NodeContext: Fezzerk's subservience trickles away as he realises that the drow player is not in fact a superior of his in the cult.

204.speaker: Player
204.text: Of course I'm a True Soul. How dare you even question the fact?
204.context: CinematicNodeContext: The lead goblin's nervous expression slips away as he realises he was mistaken about the player's allegiance. NodeContext: Fezzerk's subservience trickles away as he realises that the drow player is not in fact a superior of his in the cult.

284.speaker: Fezzerk
284.text: N-no, not questionin', True Soul! Never! We know our place...

75.speaker: Fezzerk
75.text: ...It's, erm, it's back at our camp. The boss will be expectin' us.

116.speaker: Player
116.text: Cease your babbling - what did you mean?
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: The lead goblin's nervous expression slips away as he realises he was mistaken about the player's allegiance. NodeContext: Fezzerk's subservience trickles away as he realises that the drow player is not in fact a superior of his in the cult.

153.speaker: Fezzerk
153.context: CinematicNodeContext: The lead goblin's nervous expression slips away as he realises he was mistaken about the player's allegiance. NodeContext: Fezzerk's subservience trickles away as he realises that the drow player is not in fact a superior of his in the cult.

148.speaker: Fezzerk
148.text: If you ain't with the Absolute, you're the enemy.

189.speaker: Player
189.text: I don't answer to the likes of you.
189.context: NodeContext: Intimidated by the player, and trying to make his excuses to slip away as soon as possible.

163.speaker: Fezzerk
163.text: Erm, p-pardon, sir. Didn't mean to doubt you. I know my place.
163.context: NodeContext: Intimidated by the player, and trying to make his excuses to slip away as soon as possible.

137.speaker: Fezzerk
137.text: Erm, p-pardon. Didn't mean to doubt you. I know my place.
137.context: NodeContext: Intimidated by the player, and trying to make his excuses to slip away as soon as possible.

9.speaker: Fezzerk
9.text: W-well, that's that... We'll be on our way. Do as you like with the pipsqueak...
9.context: NodeContext: Intimidated by the player, and trying to make his excuses to slip away as soon as possible.

227.text: Naw... something ain't right. You're not like the others...
227.context: CinematicNodeContext: The lead goblin's demeanour changes from nervousness to suspicion.NodeContext: Fezzerk fear of the drow player slips away, replaced by suspicion.

279.speaker: Fezzerk
279.text: Naw... something ain't right. You're not like the others...
279.context: CinematicNodeContext: The lead goblin's demeanour changes from nervousness to suspicion.NodeContext: Fezzerk fear of the drow player slips away, replaced by suspicion.

207.speaker: Player
207.text: Naturally - do I look cursed to you?
207.context: NodeContext: A little distant and dazed. He's just been psychically interferred with by the player, so that he does as they say.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: Say nothing. Stare down the gibbering coward.
15.context: NodeContext: A little distant and dazed. He's just been psychically interferred with by the player, so that he does as they say.

202.speaker: Player
202.text: Did I say you could ask questions?
202.context: NodeContext: A little distant and dazed. He's just been psychically interferred with by the player, so that he does as they say.

64.speaker: Player
64.text: I am the fear-dream of disloyal whelps. You are starting to irk me. Leave.
64.context: NodeContext: A little distant and dazed. He's just been psychically interferred with by the player, so that he does as they say.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: I am a True Soul. Your prisoner is now mine.
37.context: NodeContext: A little distant and dazed. He's just been psychically interferred with by the player, so that he does as they say.

100.context: NodeContext: A little distant and dazed. He's just been psychically interferred with by the player, so that he does as they say.

129.speaker: Fezzerk
129.context: NodeContext: A little distant and dazed. He's just been psychically interferred with by the player, so that he does as they say.

88.speaker: Narrator
88.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
88.context: NodeContext: Faraway and subservient after being psychically dominated by the player.

280.speaker: Fezzerk
280.text: We'll, eh... we'll be on our way, True Soul. Do as you like with the pipsqueak...
280.context: NodeContext: Faraway and subservient after being psychically dominated by the player.

130.speaker: Narrator
130.text: *The goblins slink backwards, afraid to take their eyes off you.*

55.speaker: Player
55.text: Wait - I haven't dismissed you. Continue the show.

140.speaker: Fezzerk
140.text: Erm... n-not much to it: pull a lever an' enjoy the squeals.

173.speaker: Fezzerk
173.text: We gotta dash. Goblin business... erm, very important.

43.speaker: Fezzerk
43.text: Erm... ask the pipsqueak on the spinny tower - we're out of here!

266.speaker: Fezzerk
266.text: C'mon, you lot, hop it before they change their mind!

219.speaker: Narrator
219.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

127.speaker: Narrator
127.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

102.speaker: Narrator
102.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

107.speaker: Narrator
107.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

223.speaker: Narrator
223.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

188.speaker: Narrator
188.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

201.speaker: Player
201.text: I am a True Soul. Your prisoner is now mine.
201.context: NodeContext: Intimidated by the player, and trying to make his excuses to slip away as soon as possible.

233.speaker: Player

19.text: Show them your brand and tell them to carry on.
19.context: NodeContext: Intimidated by the player, and trying to make his excuses to slip away as soon as possible.

76.speaker: Fezzerk
76.text: Erm... well, y'see... I just remembered... our boss - he's the same as you.
76.context: NodeContext: Intimidated by the player, and trying to make his excuses to slip away as soon as possible.

120.speaker: Fezzerk
120.text: And, erm, he wants us back at our camp. Right now.

54.text: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*

40.speaker: Narrator
40.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Leave, immediately. This prisoner is mine now.
5.context: NodeContext: Caught between deferential and wary.The drow player could be his superior, or an outside threat.

269.speaker: Fezzerk
269.text: Y-you want that little pipsqueak...? But we're supposed to take 'im hostage...
269.context: NodeContext: Caught between deferential and wary.The drow player could be his superior, or an outside threat.

274.speaker: Fezzerk
274.text: ...but you know that, of course... erm... don't you?
274.context: NodeContext: Warily seeking confirmation that the player is a superior of his, and not some random stranger.

278.speaker: Player
278.text: Did I tell you to stop? Turn around and continue as you were.

239.speaker: Fezzerk
239.context: NodeContext: Fezzerk is surprised and still wary of the drow player's intentions.

259.speaker: Fezzerk
259.text: K-keep him spinning! Make that birdie chirp!
259.context: NodeContext: Fezzerk continues to taunt the captive gnome, but is now nervous and self-conscious due to the observing drow player. It's like his boss is breathing down his neck.

183.speaker: Fezzerk
183.text: G-get that birdie spinning again! Make him chirp for us!
183.context: NodeContext: Fezzerk continues to taunt the captive gnome, but is now nervous and self-conscious due to the observing drow player. It's like his boss is breathing down his neck.

(The line is addressed to the goblin raider and scavenger, but Fezzerk's attention is broadly held by the player.NodeContext: Cruel bravado.The goblin sees the player approach and boldly announces it to his cronies - he thinks some fresh victims have just turned up.

277.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Cinematic/look-at context - Fezzerk calls out to taunt his deep gnome prisoner, who rotates on the sail of a windmill a short-moderate distance off.NodeContext: Greatly amused. A schoolyard bully tormenting the little kid. Projecting his voice a little (Fezzerk calls out to taunt his deep gnome prisoner, who rotates on the sail of a windmill a short-moderate distance off.)
'Yehehueh!' = Fezzerk's distinct laugh (a raspy, mean-spirited slur of a laugh)

272.context: NodeContext: Proud (Referring to the captive gnome's he's tied to the rotating sail of a windmill)(

60.speaker: Player

60.context: NodeContext: Mocking. Refers to the player's previous statement ('I don't want trouble - just want to pass by').

22.speaker: Barcus Wroot

254.speaker: Fezzerk
254.text: 'Less you wanna join him up there, you'd best pay the toll.
254.context: CinematicNodeContext: The lead goblin looks at his hands and tries to calculate a figure with his fingers.NodeContext: Fezzerk mockingly refers to the deep gnome's predicament as he threatens the player. 'Passing by' refers to rotating on a windmill rather than safe passage through the area, in his book.

141.speaker: Fezzerk
141.text: 'Less you wanna join him up there, you'd best pay the toll.
141.context: CinematicNodeContext: The lead goblin looks at his hands and tries to calculate a figure with his fingers.NodeContext: Confident, threatening. Thinks he holds all the cards in a one-sided negotiation.

108.speaker: Fezzerk

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fezzerk reacts to receiving a heavy sum of gold.NodeContext: Happy disbelief. Fezzerk is gobsmacked by the weight of gold, then starts laughing in disbelief. He's just gotten a lot more than he anticipated.

249.speaker: Player

98.speaker: Fezzerk

98.context: CinematicNodeContext: Fezzerk reacts to receiving a heavy sum of gold.NodeContext: Happy disbelief. Fezzerk is gobsmacked by the weight of gold, then starts laughing in disbelief. He's just gotten a lot more than he anticipated.

182.speaker: Fezzerk
182.text: Y'know what? Fair's fair. On yer way, an' take the runt, too. We've got gold to count...
182.context: NodeContext: Chuckling in amazement. Almost friendly. He's just struck the jackpot and has completely lost interest in the proceedings at hand.

264.speaker: Fezzerk
264.text: Y'know what? Fair's fair. Enjoy the show. C'mon, you lot, leave the runt. Let's go.
264.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Context - the goblins leave, content to take gold over their captive|NodeContext: Chuckling in amazement. Almost friendly. He's just struck the jackpot and has completely lost interest in the proceedings at hand.

36.speaker: Player
36.text: I can pay twice that much. I just have to go and fetch it.
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: *The goblin counted out on his grimy fingers once again.*NodeContext: A dimwit bully who thinks he's shrewd operator.

131.text: A haggler, are ya? How 'bout this: you live...
131.context: CinematicNodeContext: *The goblin counted out on his grimy fingers once again.*NodeContext: A dimwit bully who thinks he's shrewd operator.

226.speaker: Fezzerk
226.context:
NodeContext: Mocking. Delighted with himself. Thinks he's really blindsided the player (in reality, he's demanded a far smaller sum than the first figure he's asked of the player).
'Yehehueh!' = Fezzerk's distinct laugh (a raspy, mean-spirited slur of a laugh)

276.speaker: Player
276.text: Here's my counter-offer: you can all live so long as you leave right now.
276.context: NodeContext: Displeased. He wasn't expecting negotiations to actually involve negotiating.

248.speaker: Fezzerk
248.text: If I see you here again, no price will save you.

261.speaker: Player
261.text: You do know that's a lower figure, yes?
261.context: NodeContext: Deeply offended. Completely oblivious to his mathematical failings.

198.speaker: Player

275.speaker: Fezzerk
275.text: What're you sayin', that I can't count?!
275.context: NodeContext: Deeply offended. Completely oblivious to his mathematical failings.

238.speaker: Fezzerk
238.text: I'll count how long it takes you to bleed out unless you pay!

234.speaker: Player
234.text: I've changed my mind - release the gnome and clear off. Or else.
234.context: NodeContext: Unwavering. The player has decided to stand up for themselves after intially being deferential, but Fezzerk is having none of it.

205.speaker: Fezzerk
205.text: Or else what, you'll fight us? Bit late to find some backbone, don't you reckon?
205.context: NodeContext: Unwavering. The player has decided to stand up for themselves after intially being deferential, but Fezzerk is having none of it.

110.speaker: Player

82.speaker: Fezzerk
82.text: We're gettin' gold from you even if we 'ave to take the fillings from your teeth!

220.speaker: Player

83.speaker: Player

186.context: NodeContext: Alarm and outrage. Realised the player was reading his mind.

74.speaker: Fezzerk

176.speaker: Player
176.text: This will lead only to pain, not fulfilment.
176.context: NodeContext: Doesn't quite comprehend the player's meaning ('I clenched my fist. This would lead them only to pain, not fulfillment') He just wants his ransom.

114.speaker: Fezzerk

114.context: NodeContext: Doesn't quite comprehend the player's meaning ('I clenched my fist. This would lead them only to pain, not fulfillment') He just wants his ransom.

128.speaker: Player

44.speaker: Fezzerk

44.context: CinematicNodeContext: *The goblin counted out on his grimy fingers once again.*NodeContext: Doesn't fall for the player's gambit -  'I rattled off directions to a non-existent cache of gold. All theirs'

181.speaker: Player

181.context: CinematicNodeContext: *The goblin counted out on his grimy fingers once again.*NodeContext: Offended. The player tried to explain his own business to him and he isn't having any of it (a fight breaks out right afterwards)

222.speaker: Fezzerk
222.text: I don't want lessons, I want gold. But I'll settle for cuttin' out that silver tongue of yours...
222.context: CinematicNodeContext: *The goblin counted out on his grimy fingers once again.*NodeContext: Offended. The player tried to explain his own business to him and he isn't having any of it (a fight breaks out right afterwards)

236.speaker: Player
236.text: I think I'll just kill you for free instead.
236.context: NodeContext: In this moment, he's deciding he's going to have to kill the player.

125.speaker: Player

125.context: NodeContext: In this moment, he's deciding he's going to have to kill the player.

41.speaker: Player

28.speaker: Fezzerk
28.text: Oh, that's how it is, is it...?

206.speaker: Player

142.speaker: Narrator
142.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

230.speaker: Fezzerk
230.text: Heh, funny. That's what our birdie wanted.

166.speaker: Player

166.context: CinematicNodeContext: Context - the goblin reaches for his weapon.

262.speaker: Fezzerk
262.text: We ain't lookin' fer company, maggot - not unless you wanna join 'im up there...

177.speaker: Fezzerk
177.text: Heh... How 'bout this: you pay a toll, an' go on as you like... or else you fly!

192.speaker: Player
192.context: CinematicNodeContext: Context - the goblin reaches for his weapon.

156.speaker: Player

199.speaker: Fezzerk

67.speaker: Fezzerk
67.context: CinematicNodeContext: Context - the goblin reaches for his weapon.

172.speaker: Narrator

265.speaker: Player

96.speaker: Fezzerk

68.speaker: Fezzerk
68.context: NodeContext: Angry (at the subordinate who questioned him) but also nervous - he wants to leave while he has a chance.

101.speaker: Narrator
101.text: There'll be richer pickings than these little gnats someplace else.
101.context: NodeContext: Unconvincing attempt to save face. He's just bottled it and is retreating/

210.speaker: Fezzerk
210.text: There's plenty of sport an' rich pickings out there fer us. Move it!
210.context: NodeContext: Unconvincing attempt to save face. He's just bottled it and is retreating/

21.speaker: Fezzerk
21.text: Apologies, your grace. We didn't mean to doubt a True Soul. We'll be off.

252.text: The runt's ours. You should've taken a wide path around us.

122.speaker: Fezzerk

122.context: CinematicNodeContext: The goblin scowls and draw his scimitar/brandishes it if already drawn.NodeContext: Unwavering. He won't be won over by any powers of persuasion on the player's part.

123.speaker: Fezzerk
123.text: We ain't going no place! And y'know what? Neither are you...
123.context: NodeContext: Fed up of negotiations. Time to just kill this nosey parker.

285.speaker: Player

285.context: NodeContext: There's bigger fish in the lake, he wonders out loud.

147.speaker: Player
147.context: NodeContext: There's bigger fish in the lake, he wonders out loud.

134.speaker: Player

134.context: NodeContext: There's bigger fish in the lake, he wonders out loud.

174.speaker: Player

72.speaker: Player

72.context: NodeContext: There's bigger fish in the lake, he wonders out loud.

161.speaker: Fezzerk

194.speaker: Player

194.context: NodeContext: The goblin's internal thoughts, which the player is 'eavesdropping' on. Worried. Scheming.

124.speaker: Player
124.context: NodeContext: The goblin's internal thoughts, which the player is 'eavesdropping' on. Worried. Scheming.

57.text: I ain't got much stomach for a fight. Better just put on a show an' scare this one off.

218.speaker: Fezzerk

218.context: NodeContext: The goblin's internal thoughts, which the player is 'eavesdropping' on. Worried. Scheming.

80.speaker: Player

80.context: NodeContext: Fezzerk pronounced 'Fez-irk'. Previous bluster deflates rapidly. Fezzerk is shocked to realise that the player appears to be his ally, and quickly adopts a less confrontational tone.

59.text: Well... all right, take 'im. But he still counts as my catch, not yours!
59.context: NodeContext: Fezzerk pronounced 'Fez-irk'. Previous bluster deflates rapidly. Fezzerk is shocked to realise that the player appears to be his ally, and quickly adopts a less confrontational tone.

224.speaker: Player

224.context: NodeContext: Fezzerk tries to keep face, but his confidence rapidly crumbles as he digests the player's threat ('I smiled. His skull would make a fine chalice, once I cleaned it out')

221.speaker: Fezzerk

221.context: NodeContext: Fezzerk tries to keep face, but his confidence rapidly crumbles as he digests the player's threat ('I smiled. His skull would make a fine chalice, once I cleaned it out')

106.speaker: Player

106.context: NodeContext: Momentarily confused. He doesn't realise the nature of the threat just level at him.

247.speaker: Fezzerk
247.context: NodeContext: Momentarily confused. He doesn't realise the nature of the threat just level at him.

167.speaker: Fezzerk

197.speaker: Narrator

1.speaker: Player
1.text: You will release the gnome. That's an order.
1.context: NodeContext: A little dazed and distant. Though he doesn't know it, the goblin has just been psychically dominated into following the player's command.

184.speaker: Fezzerk
184.context: NodeContext: A little dazed and distant. Though he doesn't know it, the goblin has just been psychically dominated into following the player's command.

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*

23.speaker: Narrator
23.text: *The goblin's nostrils flare nervously. All of his bluster seems to vanish.*

49.speaker: Narrator
49.text: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*

109.speaker: Narrator
109.text: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: *A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*

208.speaker: Narrator
208.text: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*

165.speaker: Narrator
165.text: *The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*

168.speaker: Narrator
168.text: *Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*

145.speaker: Player
145.text: I am a True Soul. Now, once again - release the gnome.

159.speaker: Player
159.text: I am a True Soul. Now once again - release the gnome.

99.speaker: Player

271.text: No! Get out of my head!

121.speaker: Fezzerk

270.text: *As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*

119.speaker: Fezzerk

164.speaker: Fezzerk

164.context: NodeContext: Enough talk. He gave the player fair warning - now they fight.
